awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Affine Lie Groups, Arithmetic        Surfaces, and Quantum Field Theory on a Riemann Surface
awd_abstract_narration: This project is concerned with quantum field theory on a                   Riemann surface and the information that this will shed on                      automorphic forms, the index theorem and finite simple groups.                  The principal investigator will endeavor to obtain the Quillen                  metric for the determinant line bundle for holomorphic vector                   bundles on a compact Riemann surface by means of representation                 theory. Further, he will continue to explore the arithmetric                    theory of loop groups and loop group monopoles.                                      The research supported is at an important focus of current                 mathematical activity, where group representation theory,                       quantum field theory, and algebraic geometry all come together.                 This work has important implications for theoretical physics,                   as well as for several areas of mathematics.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
